text: 12:3 Luk 7:37,38Adudagi Mary-na mamal atangba asengba nard-ki12:3 Nard: Himalay chingsanggi lamdamsingda houba manam nungsiba thao amadi mahi semnaba pambi ama. manam nungsiba mahi litre makhaimuk oigadaba ama puraktuna Jisugi khongda heirammi aduga mahakki masamna Ibungogi khong teithoklammi. Maduda yum adu nungsiba manam aduna pumthal thallammi.
